entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 12:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times mixed with snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
